empty.subheader: No files are uploaded yet for this study

permissionTable.notAdmin: You cannot access permissions as you are not a Study administrator.

selectToProceed: Select one or more studies to proceed to the next step.
selectToProceedOrCreate: Select one or more studies to proceed to the next step or create a study by clicking on "Create Study" button at the top.

my.subheader: To create a study, click on the "Create Study" button at the top.

open.header: No studies from the Open Data project
open.subheader: The information in this page is updated once a day, please come back later.

org.subheader: Studies created at the organization level can be shared but you don't have any that is shared with you.
org.canCreate: You can create one yourself by clicking on the "Create Study" button at the top.
org.cantCreate: Consider viewing the Open Data studies by clicking on the Open Data tab above.

missAssociation.header: Missing association with one or more projects!
missAssociation.subheader: You won't be able to select or create studies because you currently don't have any association with one or more projects, please contact your administrator.

limitedAccess.subheader: You currently have limited access and will not be able to select studies to proceed to the next step.
